sub_title: Communications Coordinator | Impact Maker | Food Systems Advocate | Impact Hub Budapest
summary:
As a passionate introvert with a strong passion for gastronomy, sustainability, and art, I embrace Picasso's quote "Art is theft" as a guiding principle in my approach to food systems innovation. Leading üåæB√∫za, a visionary agri-food project that fuels collaboration, drives sustainable food culture, and inspires younger generations to make meaningful contributions to the agri-food sector.

Cover photo: ‚ÄúWheatfields‚Äù by √Ågnes D√©nes, Hungarian-born artist‚Äôs environmental installations of Wheatfields symbolize a universal concept that refers to food, energy, commerce, economics, mismanagement, waste, world hunger and ecological concerns, calling attention to our misplaced priorities and questioning our human values in relation to the future of humanity.
